import axios from 'axios'; import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import classes from '../cssModules/CreatePost.module.css' const UpdatePost = () => { const [updatedTitle, setUpdatedTitle] = useState(''); const [updatedSubtitle, setUpdatedSubtitle] = useState(''); const [updatedBody, setUpdatedBody] = useState(''); return (
setUpdatedTitle(e.target.value)} type="text" className={classes.Input} placeholder="Title" style={{ marginTop: "20px" }} />
setUpdatedSubtitle(e.target.value)} type="text" className={classes.Input} placeholder="Sub Title" />
